name: Disciple of the Nadir
text: Send 1 monster from your Extra Deck to the GY, then add 1 "Dragma" monster or 1 "Albus the Nullius Filius" from your Deck or GY to your hand with ATK less than or equal to the sent monster's. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck. You can only activate 1 "Disciple of the Nadir" per turn.
